import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" /* Now using object destructuring to pull out the individual keys in the `props` object that gets passed to this component. https://tylermcginnis.com/videos/object-array-destructuring/ */ const DetailCard = ({id, gigName, resource, date, rating, venueName, venueCity, audienceName, spotName }) => { return (
{name}

{rating ? rating : ""}

{gigName ? gigName : ""}

{ Details }
) } export default DetailCard
